questions.text: True or False. By default CloudFormation rolls back its changes when a stack fails to deploy successfully.
True or False. You only pay for the resources that are created by CloudFormation. You do not need to pay for the actual service.
True or False. On a CloudFormation rollback you will not be charged for the resources that were rolled back.
True or False.  In CloudFormation, you can install software on an EC2 instance at the time of stack creation.
True or False. There is a limit to the number of Lambda of functions that can execute at once.
True or False. CloudFormation can work with Chef and Puppet.
